body.name: MOLBIUS Full Size Mattress | 10 Inch Hybrid Mattresses Full in a Box | Medium Firm Memory Foam and Individual Pocket Springs | Fiberglass Free Bed Matress | Breathable, CertiPUR-US, 100 Nights Trial
features: PREMIUM FULL SIZE MATTRESS IN A BOX: We have meticulously crafted our 54" W x 75" D x 10" H MOLBIUS full mattress using cutting-edge technologies so you can experience the perfect night of sleep. Using only the finest materials, this fiberglass free mattress is a testament to our unwavering commitment to quality, offering a safe retreat for unparalleled rest. Every inch of the memory foam mattress embodies decades of craftsmanship, perfected to give you the best sleep experience.

SUPERIOR COMFORT: This mattress full size lets you dive into a realm of unmatched relaxation with a unique blend of individually wrapped pocket coils and premium memory foam. The mattress full size bed innovative combination not only provides superior pressure relief and support for every contour of your body but also promises enhanced breathability. The MOLBIUS full bed mattress is not just a bed in a box - it's a nightly invitation to indulge in world-class comfort.

SLEEP WELL AND WAKE UP RESTED: The MOLBIUS full size bed mattress will elevate your sleep journey to previously unattainable heights! Our medium firm mattress intricately layered hybrid design excels in temperature regulation and motion isolation, helping with tossing, turning, or disturbances from a restless partner. Every night on this full size memory foam mattress becomes an opportunity for deep, uninterrupted sleep, ensuring you wake up rejuvenated and ready to seize the day.

EASY TO USE AND SETUP: Versatility meets convenience in our mattresses! The MOLBIUS memory foam mattress full size is engineered to be a perfect fit for most common bed frames - from traditional box springs to modern platforms, bunk beds, and even floors. The setup is straightforward: unroll, unwrap, and watch the mattresses full size come to life. Please allow 48-72 hours for the full expansion of the hybrid mattress. And, a friendly reminder: be cautious during bed mattress rapid unfurling.

COMMITMENT TO QUALITY: At MOLBIUS, we're more than a brand - we're a symbol of enduring trust. Our bed full size mattress is built with CertiPUR-US and Oeko-Tex standard 100 certifications. Each full mattress in a box is manufactured under strict QC guidelines and thoroughly inspected before being shipped to you. We offer an extended 100-night trial and reassuring 10-year support. If you have questions or feedback about full size mattress in a box, our dedicated team is always eager to assist.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mattress for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Nice material, it seems very durable, very confortable. Bought it for my guest and they slept good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good…
reviews.reviewText: I switched down from an old king to this queen and I have to say… the first time laying on it was a dream for me. I feel very supported, it’s breathable, and it looks and feels very high quality. I’m impressed with the price point as well as it being a hybrid bed and with such quality! Very happy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort in a box!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my guest room and it arrived on time in a box. This mattress is firm but very comfortable. Great value for the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these mattresses for my kids. Pretty soft mattress, not as firm as expected which was a good thing (for my preference) There is absolutely no edge support so I wouldn’t recommend it for an adult but perfect for kids/preteens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We ordered a new bed frame and this mattress for my daughter. It has medium firmness. Very comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this queen size mattress for my guest room. I like the firm mattress. The price is reasonable and the bed is comfortable.The package is really nice. I definitely will buy it again if I need more mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bed is sooooooo soft and firm! First night we slept GREAT! Would definitely recommend to anyone !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've had a hybrid mattress before, and honestly I'm a bit disappointed with this one compared to the last one. The foam top doesn't feel like memory foam at all - more like the cheap variety of plain foam.It's still comfortable, and is probably good for guest rooms or if you're on a budget. It's just not the level of comfortable I was expecting. I personally will be getting a mattress topper so I can match that softness I was hoping for.
